alert.note: Alert for Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 2:48PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Baldwin, west central Santa Rosa and south central Escambia Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 147 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Lillian, or 9 miles west of West Pensacola, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pensacola, Ferry Pass, Brent, West Pensacola, Ensley, Gonzalez, Goulding, Lillian, Myrtle Grove and Elberta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal
